name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Media key support for Pocket Casts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control Pocket Casts podcast webapp from anywhere!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super simple and lightweight package that adds support for using your media keys to control Pocket Casts webapp from anywhere on your computer.

Features:
- Pause / play
- Skip forward 30 seconds
- Skip back 10 seconds

If you don't want the extension to hijack your mediakeys; Go to chrome://extensions. At the bottom there's a link called 'Keyboard shortcuts' where you can choose your own shortcuts for the extension.

Contribute or star on GitHub: https://github.com/JohnLTaylor/pocket-casts-media-controls

Pocket Casts: http://www.shiftyjelly.com/pocketcasts
